Contact Us

Contact


Contact us at dustin@mayfieldjones.com or text/call 314-605-5268 to learn more or request a puppy application. Please include an email address or alternative way to contact you. If interested in a puppy, we can send you a brief application. Just to explain our process, applicants are then waitlisted. After puppies have been evaluated, they will be matched with their new owners. We will then send you a contract customized to you. The contract will include an initial downpayment. Upon completion of payment in full, you will receive your new family member.
